name: TripleBuilder
description:
Triple Builder
- Triple Builder is a typical three-match puzzle game.

Build a building.
- Score can be obtained by placing at least three buildings of the same level connected to the top, bottom, left, and right.

Get a high score.
- In 10 minutes, play the game smart to get the highest score possible.

Explore
- Once you've completed the game, you can save the city and tour it from the first person point of view.
